name: Lost Puppy (NutsHeRO)
description:
Lost Puppy is a story of a German Shepherd puppy who lost his owner in the city and you must help him to get back home.

This is one level game to test and see feedback to improve and change the game base on your suggestions.

All sprite sheets were made by myself in Adobe Photoshop and the game was made with Unreal Engine 5.
